parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: An object containing some or all `LayoutData` properties. Constraints have to be instances of the Constraint class. Any omitted property defaults to 'auto'.

description: Provides layout information for a widget to be used by the parent widget when determining its size and position. See also [LayoutDataValue](./types.md#layoutDataValue)

left.description: The position of the widget's left edge relative to the parent or a sibling widget.

top.description: The position of the widget's top edge relative to the parent or a sibling widget.

right.description: The position of the widget's right edge relative to the parent or a sibling widget.

bottom.description: The position of the widget's bottom edge relative to the parent or a sibling widget.

centerX.description: The horizontal position of the widget's center relative to the parent's center.

centerY.description: The vertical position of the widget's center relative to the parent's center.

baseline.description: The vertical position of the widget's baseline relative to a sibling widget.

toString.description: Returns a string representation of LayoutData.

from.description: Creates a new instance of LayoutData using any valid layoutData expression. For any other value, including `null`, the method throws.

next.description: A [SiblingReference](./types.md#SiblingReference) indicating the next widget in the list of children attached to the same parent. Used by the [`baseline`](#baseline) property. An alias of `Constraint.next`.

prev.description: A [SiblingReference](./types.md#SiblingReference) indicating the previous widget in the list of children attached to the same parent. Used by the [`baseline`](#baseline) property. An alias of `Constraint.next`.
